Posts.EditableText: When I Go To Make The Game, It Says It Ran Into An Error. Please Help Me
Posts.HTML: When I Go To Make The Game, It Says It Ran Into An Error. Please Help Me

Posts.EditableText:
You'll need to be more specific than that if you want anyone to help.
We would need to know...
- Is this using the downloaded desktop version or the web version?
-- If it is the web version, are you using a "https://..." URL?
- What is the error you are getting? (Exact words.)
- Is it for a Text Adventure style or a Gamebook?
- At what point do you get the error? Is it as soon as you choose the mode or when you start typing or after you hit ENTER, etc?

And anything else you think may be helpful to someone who can't actually see what is going on.

Posts.EditableText:
PLATFORM: WEB
When I make a text adventure not gamebook when I click make game it says there was an error processing my request
please note: I will be trying the desktop version and see if I have error
Posts.HTML:
PLATFORM: WEB
When I make a text adventure not gamebook when I click make game it says there was an error processing my request
please note: I will be trying the desktop version and see if I have error

Posts.EditableText: Make sure that the web address (URL) starts with HTTPS & not just HTTP. (eg  https://textadventures.co.uk/  )
Posts.HTML: Make sure that the web address (URL) starts with HTTPS & not just HTTP. (eg https://textadventures.co.uk/ )
